title: El Camino Real
name: Mission San Luis Obispo de Tolosa
address: 728 Monterey St., San Luis Obispo, CA
hours: Open daily winter 9am-4pm, summer 9am-5pm (closed New Year's, Easter, Thanksgiving, Christmas)
content: Founded in 1772 by Junipero Serra, Mission San Luis Obispo was the fifth Catholic mission in California. Still an active parish, it is in the middle downtown on Chorro St and Monterey St, with its main courtyard interrupting Monterey St for a full city block. The Mission is part of the Mission Plaza neighborhood, which incorporates San Luis Creek and a number of stores and restaurants. Walk from the Mission to the creek and up to one of the restaurants for a bite to eat.
